contents:
Well, I know the problem is my vocabulary but can it be possible learning over 5,000 new words during 3 months? I mean totally understand their meanings and use them in articles and daily speech.
It sounds difficult.
Now I'm really depressive. The last time I used English was when I graduate from school.
I also regret using translation software too much before.
Today I tried to write something about the Wuhan Pneumonia in my Eng blog, but failed. I can't even organize my thoughts without my first language.
Some reading materials also bother me. Was it prevalent writing long sentences in 19th century's treatises?
